data.persona: I am a child. I am hungry all the time. I run around the village and try and steal food.
data.description:
You are in the Flower Field.
The flower field contains acres of wild growing flowers that are a bright pink when they are in bloom. There are woods surrounding it, but no trees in the field, only flowers. There are paths that work their way through the field.
The family dog and the bird are here.

You are carrying a bag and a food, and wearing a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I must get enough food for my brothers and sisters
data.mid_motivation: I must keep my brothers and sisters fed
data.long_motivation: I must protect my siblings because my parents are gone
